name: PHASE WARS
blurb: Phase Wars is a Multiplayer Online Arena game that allows players to fight competitively in realtime skill based combat.

rewards.reward: Thanks for your support!\r\nEvery little bit helps.
==============================                           EARLY FOUNDER\r\n==============================\r\n Same as the $10, but your early to the party.

==============================                           24 HOUR 5/9 SPECIAL\r\n==============================\r\nOn account of Rob's Birthday, for 24 hours on May 9th, You will get the 25 dollar tier. This includes the Exclusive in game head gear, poster, Digital Art Book, Soundtrack, and Kickstarter Early Access Beta.

==============================                           
                            FOUNDER
==============================
As a founder you get the Phase Wars Digital Art Book and our eternal thank you on the Endgame credits.

==============================                           
                          SCAVENGER
==============================
You have now acquired the unique supporter exclusive Kickstarter in game headgear! The first drink is on us.
You will also receive the digital art book and Digital Phase Wars Soundtrack. +All previous rewards

We are now changing this to $25, all previous $25 pledges will have beta and the poster, as well.

==============================                           
                PC BETA SCAVENGER
==============================
As you scavenge through some rubble you have found.... Exclusive Kickstarter PC Beta access, a Phase Wars Poster, Digital Artbook, Digital Soundtrack, and Kickstarter Supporter Headgear.

==============================                          
                  ANDROID COMMANDER
==============================
Your skills as a commander has helped you attain Android and PC Beta, an exclusive Kickstarter in-game armor and helmet set, as well as, a Phase Wars T Shirt, Poster, Digital Artbook, Digital Soundtrack, and Kickstarter Supporter Headgear.

==============================                          
                       iOS COMMANDER
==============================
Your skills as a commander has helped you attain iOS and PC Beta, an exclusive Kickstarter in-game armor and helmet set, as well as, a Phase Wars T Shirt, Poster, Digital Artbook, Digital Soundtrack, and Kickstarter Supporter Headgear.(If higher tier physical Items are wanted, we can add on to allow you to have iOS beta and those items.)
Estimated delivery: Aug 2015

==============================                           
                          LOOT FINDER
==============================
You will receive Exclusive Kickstarter PC beta, Android Beta, a Phase Wars T shirt, NetherWind Games Hat, Phase Wars poster, Digital Art Book, Exclusive KickStarter Armor and Helmet set, Kickstarter Supporter Headgear, and the Digital Soundtrack.

==============================\r\nCombat Proven\r\n============================== You are combat proven! Official Phase Wars Hoodie! Android Beta and PC Beta, an exclusive Kickstarter in-game armor and helmet set, as well as, a Phase Wars T Shirt, Hat, Poster, Digital Artbook, Digital Soundtrack, and Kickstarter Supporter Headgear. Estimated delivery: Aug 2015

==============================                           
               MASTER BLACKSMITH
==============================
Oh Hooray! You get to design your own weapon! Have your epic tool of killing forever be apart of Phase Wars. You will get to see other warriors wielding your creation as they slay their enemies! Also, you will get an invitation to beta on PC and either iOS or Android (your choice, iOS only for US residents).
+All Combat Proven and previous rewards

==============================                           
               LEGENDARY BLACKSMITH
==============================
You get to design your own in game Avatar, Armor, and weapon! Have your gear forever be apart of Phase Wars. You will get to see other warriors playing as your creation! Also, you will get an invitation to beta on either iOS or Android (your choice). +All Loot Finder and previous rewards (iOS for US Residents only)

==============================\r\nMYTH OF THE LOST ==============================\r\nYou will be designing your own character model, battle armor, and master weapon that is 100% unique to your character.  No other player will have access to your armor. You will also get the Exclusive Kickstarter Armor Set and Helmet, a Phase Wars T Shirt, Hat, Poster, Digital Artbook, Digital Soundtrack, and Kickstarter Supporter Headgear. Estimated delivery: Aug 2015

==============================                           
             CHAMPION OF PHASE WARS
==============================
Just like the hero before you, you will be designing your own character model, battle armor, and master weapon that is 100% unique to your character. The difference is Rob of NetherWind Games will also get a tattoo of your character that you create on his leg for everyone to see forever. It will be videotaped and placed on the NetherWind Games website for everyone to see! On top of everything else you will have the Exclusive In-game title of "Champion Of Phase Wars". You will also get the Exclusive Kickstarter Armor Set and Helmet, a Phase Wars T Shirt, Hat, Poster, Digital Artbook, Digital Soundtrack, and Kickstarter Supporter Headgear.


Estimated delivery: Aug 2015

==============================                           
              GREAT PHASE KING
==============================
You are the Great Phase King. How does the king want to look? We will work with you side by side to create your perfect armor, weapon, and character. This will be 100% unique to you and never available to any other player. You will also be able to create an armor set and weapon for all other players. You will be given producer credits, an exclusive developers T-shirt (only created for the team), you will be invited to Boise,ID to our office to work with us on the game and hang out for a game night (travel costs not covered), you will have Skype calls with the us once a week to discuss the game and improvements, you will also have the exclusive “Great Phase King” title in the game and the beginning of the endgame credits.
+You will receive all previous awards other than the Champion of PhaseWars.
